title: What Jerseys Does a Retired Pro Keep from a 20-Year Career? A Rare Insight Into Iconic Teams And Kit
content:
Bobby Julich gives an insight into the many jerseys of a pro career, including his memories of each season and of those different teams.

Read the full article at What Jerseys Does a Retired Pro Keep from a 20-Year Career? A Rare Insight Into Iconic Teams And Kit on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
